channel.title: Paradise source compiler
channel.description:
hey guys i just put the paradise source on my vps, its working but the compiler does not work. I uses the right java codes etc.. its says: javac: file not found.?
Can someone plz help me or give me the a right compiler code.
If you can help me i will give you some cash on paypall..
Thanks!
ps i got this code now..
@echo off COLOR 02 title Runescape Private Server Compiler- Pwn0r "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

item.title: Paradise source compiler

item.title: Paradise source compiler
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Yourserver, post:9, topic:545819”][quote author=Tixxt link=topic=664703.msg4443403#msg4443403 date=1407689910]
Now i get this


[/quote]

make sure the scr/com/rs is actually a directory in your files[/quote]
This is what my generator is for… To do this part exactly…

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:545819”][quote author=Yourserver link=topic=664703.msg4443395#msg4443395 date=1407689046]
Compile with jdk not jre
[/quote]
^This.

also, I’ve released a Compiler Generator. It’s super simple I believe.
Note: It does not set the java path correctly. Make sure to set it to your JDK after you run it.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Paradise source compiler
item.dc:creator: @Yourserver Yourserver
item.description:
@Yourserver wrote:

[quote=“Tixxt, post:6, topic:545819”]After i changed to dubble bin it is keeps sying this…

[/quote]
you havent specified where to compile

@echo off
title Client Compiler
echo starting…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_05/bin/javac” -cp lib/; -d bin -sourcepath src src/com/rs/.java
@pause

Read full topic

item.title: Paradise source compiler
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Yourserver:

Compile with jdk not jre

^This.

also, I’ve released a Compiler Generator. It’s super simple I believe.
Note: It does not set the java path correctly. Make sure to set it to your JDK after you run it.

item.title: Paradise source compiler
item.dc:creator: @Yourserver Yourserver
item.description:
@Yourserver wrote:

[quote=“Tixxt, post:3, topic:545819”]Now it says cannot find the specific path…

@echo off
COLOR 02
title Runescape Private Server Compiler- Pwn0r
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_05\bin\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause[/quote]

you have duplicated “\bin”

try @echo off title Client Compiler echo starting... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_11/bin/javac" -cp lib/*; -d bin -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java @pause

Read full topic

pause

hey guys i just put the paradise source on my vps, its working but the compiler does not work. I uses the right java codes etc… its says: javac: file not found.?

Can someone plz help me or give me the a right compiler code.
